text: Yara binimaye tara nijedera bikri kareche, ta khuba'i manda; yehetu tara allaha ya nayila karechena, ta asbikara kareche e'i hathakaritara daruna ye, allaha sbiya bandadera madhye yara prati iccha anugraha nayila karena. Ata'eba, tara krodhera upara krodha arjana kareche. Ara kapheradera jan'ya rayeche apamanajanaka sasti.
